Package io.github.dmlloyd.loomania

Class Loomania

java.lang.Object
io.github.dmlloyd.loomania.Loomania
public final class Loomania extends Object
Access to Loom internals for experimental munging.

  • Method Details

    • isInstalled

      public static boolean isInstalled()
      Determine if Loomania is installed.
      Returns:
      true if installed, false otherwise

    • isVirtual

      public static boolean isVirtual(Thread thread)
      Determine whether the given thread is virtual.
      Parameters:
      thread - the thread (must not be null)
      Returns:
      true if the thread is virtual, false otherwise
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if Loomania is not installed

    • currentCarrierThread

      public static Thread currentCarrierThread()
      Get the carrier thread for the current thread.
      Returns:
      the carrier thread, or the current thread if it is not virtual
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if Loomania is not installed

    • enterVirtuality

      public static void enterVirtuality(Consumer<VirtualThreadManager> mainThreadRunner)
      Cause the current thread to become a carrier for virtual threads until the virtual thread manager is terminated. The given runner is run within a virtual thread on this carrier.
      Parameters:
      mainThreadRunner - the main thread runner (must not be null)
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if Loomania is not installed

    • enterVirtuality

      public static void enterVirtuality(Consumer<VirtualThreadManager> mainThreadRunner, Runnable unparker)
      Cause the current thread to become a carrier for virtual threads until the virtual thread manager is terminated. The given runner is run within a virtual thread on this carrier.
      Parameters:
      mainThreadRunner - the main thread runner (must not be null)
      unparker - a Runnable to call when the carrier thread accepts a new task, or null for none
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if Loomania is not installed
